author: Staff Reporter
text:
An anti-untouchability pledge was taken in the Collectorate and District Police office on Friday in view of the death anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi.

In the Collectorate District Revenue Officer S. Palani administered the pledge to the employees. In the District Police Office, Additional Superintendent of Police (head quarters) M. Rangarajan administered the pledge to police personnel and ministerial staffs including Deputy Superintendents of Police D. Ashok Kumar (crime branch), V. Ashok Kumar (Prohibition Enforcement Wing) and Inspector of Police (Special Branch) R. Arul Prasath.
title: Anti-untouchability pledge taken
